profile.rationale: The job ad clearly outlines a balanced mix of tasks. It involves developing and implementing AI models, specifically mentioning LLMs and RAG (Macro-Category B, GenAI Specialization), alongside optimizing performance and scalability for AI solutions within a product (Macro-Category A, Software Development & Integration/MLOps). The focus on LLMs and RAG firmly places it in the GenAI domain.

confidence.reasoning: The job advertisement is very clear and specific about the technologies (LLMs, RAG) and the tasks involved (developing, implementing, optimizing AI solutions). The language used directly maps to the defined categories, leaving little room for ambiguity.
